title: Sri Lanka Finance Minister, officials leave for Washington for discussion with IMF - ANI News
content: Sri Lanka Finance Minister, officials leave for Washington for discussion with IMF  ANI News
description: Colombo [Sri Lanka], April 17 (ANI): Amid the ongoing economic crisis and widespread protests against the government, a four-member Sri Lankan delegation led by the newly appointed Finance Minister Ali Sabry has left for Washington for initial discussions with the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and the World Bank for a possible bailout.
